messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Fluffy Relay Papa. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Today is National 'Hunt a Wabbit' Day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Fluffy Relay Papa, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing a backpressure surge. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Fluffy Relay Papa. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: it appears you have entered a asteroid belt oh well..

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Fluffy Relay Papa. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
